// Solidity program
// to store
// Employee Details
pragma solidity ^0.5.0;

// Creating a Smart Contract
contract StructDemo{

// Structure of employee
struct product{
	// State variables
	uint uid;
	string file;
	unit bid;
}

product []dctb;


// Function to add
// products details
function addFile(uint uid, string memory f,unit bid) public{
	product memory e =product(uid, f, bid);
	dctb.push(e);
}


// Function to get details of prodcut
function getFile(uint uid) public view returns(string memory,uint){
    uint i;
	for(i=0;i<dctb.length;i++)
	{
		product memory e =dctb[i];

		// Looks for a matching
		// employee id
		if(e.uid==uid)
		{
				return(e.file,e.bid);
		}
	}
	return("0",0);
}

}
